# The `ELFLinkGraphBuilder` Class Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/linkgraph">LinkGraph</a> building code that&#39;s specific to the given ELFT, but common across all architectures. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/linkgraph">LinkGraph</a> building code that&#39;s specific to the given ELFT, but common across all architectures.

## Public Member Functions

### addRelocations() {#a32d66ea16f81504e5f47b4ff58b54314}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename ELFT&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>virtual Error llvm::jitlink::ELFLinkGraphBuilder&lt; ELFT &gt;::addRelocations ()</>}>
Call to derived class to handle relocations.

These require architecture specific knowledge to map to JITLink edge kinds.

### setProcessDebugSections() {#a59375089c93523c99145a7d1598c3ce5}

<MemberDefinition

  labels = {["inline"]}>
Debug sections are included in the graph by default.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> setProcessDebugSections(false) to ignore them if debug info is not needed.

### forEachRelaRelocation() {#ad88274d0bf0c267fe58d1d4647d1a80e}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename RelocHandlerMethod&gt;</>}
